verbs.description: [ARG0: A political scientist from Kentucky] [V: said] [ARG1: if President Donald Trump pardoned himself it would cause a " constitutional crisis] . "
A political scientist from Kentucky said if [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: pardoned] [ARG1: himself] it would cause a " constitutional crisis . "
A political scientist from Kentucky said if President Donald Trump pardoned himself it [V: would] cause a " constitutional crisis . "
